import React from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import a from './images/a.jpg'; import c from './images/c.jpg'; const Basketorders = () => { const foodItem = useSelector((state) => state.foods); console.log(foodItem) return (

Your Orders

No dish added yet...

{foodItem && foodItem.map((element) => { return <>
{element.name}

{element.subcategory} ( {element.category} )

By: SmartResto {/* */}
₹{element.price}/-
})} {/*
Veg Burger

By: SmartResto
₹25/-
*/}

) } export default Basketorders
